name: Reaplechase
description:
Beware of the reaper, for it is chasing the souls of the innocent. Born with the mark of decay, without the hope to bloom, a child has entered this world. A guardian angel will protect him, giving but a part of immortality in exchange for a mortal lifetime of blissful ignorance.

Guide the guardian and build obstructions to block the reapers path.

Use the hand power to collect metal and wood from highlighted objects and use those resources to build obstructions.

Controls

[W][A][S][D]/Arrow-Keys for movement  

[1],[2],[3] select ability  

[Q]/[E] or [mouse-wheel] to select next ability  

[Space] to work ability  

Items

Wood can be obtained from trees and other wooden objects and is needed for wooden barricades to block the path of the reaper.

Metal can be found in Trashcans and -containers. Metal barriers are more sturdy obstacles to the reaper.

You can collect Karma at particle clouds and use it to move heavy objects like vehicles.

While the reaper can't be halted by your obstructions, you can at least slow them.

They will tear down your obstacles, but placing strategic barriers will delay the inevitable.
